name: Wormswarm
description:
Wormswarm is an experimental platformer about jumping on abstract wriggling worms while scoring points. The game is based on a simple concept - the ground under your feet is constantly moving. Your goal is to score as many points as possible, dodge all the dangerous red worms and not fall into the abyss...
The huge number of moving objects forces you to quickly find the best routes and show miracles of reaction to get to the top of the leaderboard!
